item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, everyone! My name is HE Xiaobin and I am currently studying Information Technology at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. My hobbies include listening to music, watching movies and traveling. My favorite singer is Jay Chou and my favorite band is Mayday. I like to participate in various club activities and class activities to meet new friends. In my first year at HKUST, I met many outstanding and interesting new friends.

item.title: Course Project - Telemedicine Platform
item.description: OUR GROUP SUN, Yichen FU, Hao He, Xiaobin Liu, Songshang Li, Siwei BARRIOS PAPEDES Jorge NEEDFINDING During the Covid-19 pandemic, we saw overcrowded emergency rooms, shortages of doctors and nurses and disruptions to routine care. From the picture, we can see that there are too many people waiting in the hospital, and people infected with COVID-19 cannot receive timely treatment. In addition, there is a shortage of medication resources, and people find it difficult to purchase the medicine they need.

item.title: Test Article 1
item.description: A rose is either a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears. There are over three hundred species and tens of thousands of cultivars.They form a group of plants that can be erect shrubs, climbing, or trailing, with stems that are often armed with sharp prickles. Their flowers vary in size and shape and are usually large and showy, in colours ranging from white through yellows and reds.

item.title: Test Article 2
item.description: A rose is either a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears. There are over three hundred species and tens of thousands of cultivars.They form a group of plants that can be erect shrubs, climbing, or trailing, with stems that are often armed with sharp prickles. Their flowers vary in size and shape and are usually large and showy, in colours ranging from white through yellows and reds.
